column2:
[Root.GetBestName],
I welcome you to the Renowned Apotecary Society. Through the proper experiments you will learn much about life and death, all the better to heal those in need. Perhaps you will even manage to unlock the secrets of immortality, as we all aspire to.

By my hand and seal,
[alchemist_leader.GetSocietyRank] [alchemist_leader.GetFirstName]
